Name: Wooden box panel
Description: Painted wooden panel from a shabti or canopic box of Late Period type, with much loss to surface. A red border with black hieroglyphs, giving an address by the goddess Nephthys, encloses the registers of djed-pillars and tiyet-symbols. The black hieroglyphs on the green column at lower left appear to preserve part of the name of the tomb-owner, beginning Horpa-...
